General.Name: Orcadian Energy PLC
General.Description: Orcadian Energy PLC, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas development company in the United Kingdom. The company holds 100% interest in UKCS Seaward Licences P2244, which contains the Pilot and Harbour heavy oil discoveries; P2320, consist of Blakeney, Feugh, Dandy & Crinan discoveries; and P2482, which include the Elke and Narwhal discoveries. In addition, it holds 50% interest in P2516 including Fynn Beauly and Fynn Andrew discoveries. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 60 Gracechurch Street, London, United Kingdom, EC3V 0HR
